LanguageData.MMTank_Mosquito.label: Mosquito
LanguageData.MMTank_Mosquito.description:
It is a small tank for one passenger.
It was a hunter's car, but it fell off and went wild as it was.
He likes dogs
In his spare time, he uses an uncooled land mine detector to search for nearby iron scraps and electronic components, but it's not cold enough to find them.
LanguageData.MMTank_Mosquito.tools.0.label: Ram attack
